00037 class F3_MailformPlusPlus_Finisher_StoreUploadedFiles extends F3_MailformPlusPlus_AbstractFinisher {
00038 
00044         public function process() {
00045 
00046                 if($this->settings['finishedUploadFolder']) {
00047                                 
00048                         //move the uploaded files
00049                         $this->moveUploadedFiles();
00050                 }
00051 
00052                 return $this->gp;
00053         }
00054 
00076         protected function moveUploadedFiles() {
00077 
00078                 $newFolder = $this->settings['finishedUploadFolder'];
00079                 $newFolder = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::sanitizePath($newFolder);
00080                 $uploadPath = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::getDocumentRoot().$newFolder;
00081         
00082                 session_start();
00083                 if(isset($_SESSION['mailformplusplusFiles']) && is_array($_SESSION['mailformplusplusFiles']) && strlen($newFolder) > 0 ) {
00084                         foreach($_SESSION['mailformplusplusFiles'] as $field=>$files) {
00085                                 foreach($files as $key => $file) {
00086                                         $newFilename = $this->getNewFilename($file['uploaded_name']);
00087 
00088                                         F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage('copy_file',$file['uploaded_path'].$file['uploaded_name'],$uploadPath.$newFilename);
00089                                         copy($file['uploaded_path'].$file['uploaded_name'],$uploadPath.$newFilename);
00090                                         unlink($file['uploaded_path'].$file['uploaded_name']);
00091 
00092                                         $_SESSION['mailformplusplusFiles'][$field][$key]['uploaded_path'] = $uploadPath;
00093                                         $_SESSION['mailformplusplusFiles'][$field][$key]['uploaded_name'] = $newFilename;
00094                                         $_SESSION['mailformplusplusFiles'][$field][$key]['uploaded_folder'] = $newFolder;
00095                                         $_SESSION['mailformplusplusFiles'][$field][$key]['uploaded_url'] = t3lib_div::getIndpEnv('TYPO3_SITE_URL').$newFolder.$newFilename;
00096 
00097                                 }
00098                         }
00099                 }
00100         }
00101 
00109         protected function getNewFilename($oldName) {
00110                 $fileparts = explode('.',$oldName);
00111                 $fileext = '.'.$fileparts[count($fileparts)-1];
00112                 array_pop($fileparts);
00113                 $filename = implode('.',$fileparts);
00114 
00115                 $namingScheme = $this->settings['renameScheme'];
00116                 if(!$namingScheme) {
00117                         $namingScheme = '[filename]_[time]';
00118                 }
00119                 $newFilename = $namingScheme;
00120                 $newFilename = str_replace('[filename]',$filename,$newFilename);
00121                 $newFilename = str_replace('[time]',time(),$newFilename);
00122                 $newFilename = str_replace('[md5]',md5($filename),$newFilename);
00123                 $newFilename = str_replace('[pid]',$GLOBALS['TSFE']->id,$newFilename);
00124                 if(is_array($this->settings['schemeMarkers.'])) {
00125                         foreach($this->settings['schemeMarkers.'] as $markerName=>$options) {
00126                                 if(!(strpos($markerName,'.') > 0)) {
00127                                         $value = $options;
00128 
00129                                         //use field value
00130                                         if(isset($this->settings['schemeMarkers.'][$markerName.'.']) && !strcmp($options,"fieldValue")) {
00131                                                 
00132                                                 $value = $this->gp[$this->settings['schemeMarkers.'][$markerName.'.']['field']];
00133 
00134                                         }elseif(isset($this->settings['schemeMarkers.'][$markerName.'.'])) {
00135 
00136                                                 //pass gp to the plugin 
00137                                                 if(!strcmp($options,"USER") || !strcmp($options,"USER_INT")) {
00138                                                         $this->settings['schemeMarkers.'][$markerName.'.']['gp'] = $this->gp;
00139                                                 }
00140                                                 $value = $this->cObj->cObjGetSingle($this->settings['schemeMarkers.'][$markerName],$this->settings['schemeMarkers.'][$markerName.'.']);
00141                                         }
00142                                         $newFilename = str_replace('['.$markerName.']',$value,$newFilename);
00143                                 }
00144                         }
00145                 }
00146                 //remove ',' from filename, would be handled as file seperator 
00147                 $newFilename = str_replace(',', '', $newFilename);
00148 
00149                 $newFilename .= $fileext;
00150                 return $newFilename;
00151         }
00152 
00153 }
